SELECT a.album_id AS albumId, a.album_name AS albumName, a.album_release_date AS albumReleaseDate, a.album_bio AS albumBio, a.album_cover AS albumCover, t.type_name AS typeName, s.singer_name AS singerName FROM album_info a LEFT JOIN singer_info s ON a.singer_id = s.singer_id LEFT JOIN type_info t ON a.type_id = t.type_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0
AND a.album_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{albumQry.albumName}, '%')

SELECT ai.album_id AS albumId, ai.album_name AS albumName, ai.album_cover AS albumCover, si.singer_name AS singerName FROM album_info ai INNER JOIN singer_info si ON ai.singer_id = si.singer_id WHERE ai.album_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND ai.delete_flag = 0 AND si.delete_flag = 0 LIMIT #{limit}
